import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent { constructor(private router:Router) { } route(){ this.router.navigateByUrl("/login"); } }
